experiences.title: Programming Tutor
workDescription: Helped students grasp core concepts of C++ and Java, achieving a 100% success rate in exam pass rates.
Conducted code reviews, identified errors, and provided feedback to improve students' programming skills.

experiences.title: PC Building and Repair
workDescription: Building, configuring, and customizing PCs based on clients' specifications.
Installed and configured operating systems, drivers, and software applications.
Repaired and resolved hardware and software problems, including component replacements and incompatibilities, system/BIOS upgrades, and malware removal.
